mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AML_RECORD_INDEX ( ID,EI,CATEGORY,UPDATECATEGORY,SUB_CATEGORY,UPDATED,POSITION,TITLE,PLACE_OF_BIRTH,DOB,DECEASED,COUNTRIES, FIRST_NAME,LAST_NAME,ENTERED,IMPDATESTR ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{ei, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{category, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{updateCategory, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{subCategory, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{updated, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{position, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{title, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{placeOfBirth, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{bob, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{deceased, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{countries, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{firstName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{lastName, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entered, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{impDateStr, jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
